# Comparison with @magnetic/spinner

| Props          | MDS | CDS  |
| -------------- | --- | ---- |
| size           | ✅  | ✅\* |
| margin         | ✅  | ✅   |
| label          |     | ✅   |
| labelPlacement |     | ✅   |

> 1 - The `size` prop has been updated to the below values -

- 'sm' (20px)
- 'md' (36px)
- 'lg' (48px)
- 'xl' (72px)
